actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act (Public Law 92-583) in order to allow State approval prior to oil drilling operations seaward of a marine sanctuary established by said coastal State, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires State approval, under the Coastal Zone Management Act, as a prerequisite to the validity of Federal authorization of oil drilling operations seaward of a marine sanctuary established by said coastal State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act (Public Law 92-583) in order to allow State approval prior to oil drilling operations seaward of a marine sanctuary established by said coastal State, and for other purposes.
